title: shrI mUlAdhAra
sahitya:
shrI mUlAdhAra cakra vinAyaka amUlya varapradAyaka


anupallavi

 mUlA jnAna shOka vinAshaka mUlakanda muktipradAyaka


caraNam   sakaLIkrta dEvAdidEva shabaLIkrta sarvajna svabhAva prakaTIkrta vaikharI 
svabhAva parAbhava prasiddha gajagrIva vikaTa SaTsata 0shvAsAdhikAra vicitrAkAra 
bhaktOpakAra akaLaNka vibhAsvara vighnEsha vara guruguha sOdara lambOdara
